text: 25.34: 1 Ko 6.9; 15.50; Ga 5.21; Hi 4.3; 1 Pi 1.20Mba ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan won guva haren ki gumgi gu mbigi ana khaŋ mbe suanga, ‘Nde Dara ndɨkndɨga vhuun nden muunga. Ana tɨvar vhuun nden muun za mbui.’ Mba ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan khaŋ mbe suanga, ‘Nde zɨv na Dara nde nzuav muuŋgi ŋgu, nde zɨv fharav ana ndigip anan kɨri.
